name: STSS (MALTA) Limited
headAddress: Portomaso tower annex, level 7, vjal Portomaso
goal:
STASIS operates in cryptocurrency business. We digitize financial assets by putting them on the blockchain in a secure and transparent way. One EURS-token represents one euro, and is fully backed by actual euro currency kept in a reserve.

STASIS puts a lot of effort to improve the perception of the industry and show that crypto-businesses can operate in a fully legal and transparent environment. When designing EURS, STASIS contracted Tiang&Co (a Hong Kong's affiliate of PWC) and Ganado advocates (a leading Maltese law firm). STASIS received a legal status of a virtual financial asset in Malta, and has been a part of the Maltese workforce behind the cryptocurrency regulatory framework introduced in summer 2018.
interests: Banking and financial services, Digital economy and society, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Malta:
Digital Innovation Authority Bill
Technology Arrangements and Services Bill
Virtual Financial Assets Bill
